actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to codify, revise, and reform title 18 of the United States Code; to make appropriate amendments to the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure; to make conforming amendments to criminal provisions of other titles of the United States Code.
short_title: Federal Criminal Law Revision and Constitutional Rights Preservation Act

summary.text: Federal Criminal Law Revision and Constitutional Rights Preservation Act - Amends and recodifies Title 18 of the United States Code (Crimes and Criminal Procedure). Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure - Revises the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure. Revises the Rules of Procedure for the Trial of Minor Offenses before United States Magistrates.

titles.title: Federal Criminal Law Revision and Constitutional Rights Preservation Act

A bill to codify, revise, and reform title 18 of the United States Code; to make appropriate amendments to the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure; to make conforming amendments to criminal provisions of other titles of the United States Code.
